title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) The
people's right to know the process of government decisionmaking and the
documents and statistics leading to determinations is basic to our society. Access to such information should not be thwarted by shrouding it with the
cloak of secrecy or confidentiality. (b) This Part provides information concerning
the procedures by which public records of the State Energy Office may be
obtained. (c) State Energy Office
personnel shall furnish to the public the information and records required by
the Freedom of Information Law, as well as records otherwise available by
law. (d) Any conflicts among laws
and regulations governing public access to records shall be construed in favor
of the widest possible availability of public records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7801.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
